participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: She is curious and enjoys engaging in stimulating conversations. Jessica is passionate about history and enjoys exploring different cultures.
participant_1.background: I can't stand salads. I graduated valedictorian of my high school class. My father used to be an insurance salesman. My mother stayed at home all day to raise me and my siblings.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: David is reflective and organized, with a love for structure in his work and play. He has a creative side that comes out in his travel and hobbies.
participant_2.background: I work as a freelance accountant. Once a year, I take a week off and head to Florida. I was diagnosed with mild OCD in college. Sometimes I feel like I've already been through life once before.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I work as a freelance accountant.
Oh, that's interesting. How did you get into that?
I started out working for a big accounting firm, but I found that I preferred working on my own.
I can see why. It must be nice to be your own boss.
It is. I get to set my own hours and work on projects that I'm passionate about.
That's awesome. I'm glad you found something you love.
Thanks. Me too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel. I take a week off every year and head to Florida.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I've never been to Florida.
You should go! It's beautiful there.
I'll have to put it on my bucket list.
Do it! You won't regret it.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read. I read a lot of different genres, but I'm a big fan of historical fiction.
I love historical fiction too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon, and I'm also a big fan of the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about those! I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should. They're both great series.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch movies. I'm a big fan of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
Me too! I've seen all of the movies in the MCU.
What's your favorite movie?
I think my favorite is Avengers: Endgame.
That's a good choice. It's one of my favorites too.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games. I'm a big fan of the Assassin's Creed series.
Me too! I've played all of the games in the series.
What's your favorite game?
I think my favorite is Assassin's Creed: Origins.
That's a good choice. It's one of my favorites too.
